# FitBenchmark Problem
software = 'Mantid'
name = 'WISH17701 panel 103 tube 3 calibration, peak 9'
description = 'An example of tube calibration for the WISH instrument'
input_file = 'WISH17701_calibration_panel103_tube3.txt'
function = 'name=LinearBackground,A0=6090,A1=0;name=Gaussian,Height=21353,PeakCentre=448.191,Sigma=1'
fit_ranges = {'x': [433.19108228800002, 463.19108228800002]}
